test

Class TestDTNHost

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.DTNHost
      • test.TestDTNHost
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<DTNHost>

    public class TestDTNHost
extends DTNHost
    A test stub of DTNHost for testing. All fields are public so they can be easily read from test cases.
